Package edboy.shapes

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • edboy.shapes.Shape
      • edboy.shapes.Shape2D
        • edboy.shapes.Rectangle
  • public class Rectangle
extends Shape2D
    Creates a rectangle object that can be manipulated or checked if something is inside of it
    Version:
    9/26/18
    Author:
    Eduard Mirzoyan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a rectangle object Sets all fields to zero, makes an empty rectangle.
      Rectangle​(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a rectangle object
      Rectangle​(double x, double y, double width, double height, int stroke, int strokeWeight)
      Creates a rectangle object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void draw​(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      Draws a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width.
      double getArea()
      Calculates and returns the area of the rectangle
      double getPerimeter()
      Calculates and returns the perimeter of the rectangle
      boolean isPointInside​(double x, double y)
      Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside this rectangle
      void scale​(int value)
      Dilates the rectangle an input amount from its top left corner point
      void translate​(int x, int y)
      Relocates the rectangle to input point

        public Rectangle​(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,

        Creates a rectangle object
        Parameters:
        x - x-cord of top left corner

        width - width of rectangle
        height - height of rectangle

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle​(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height,
                 int stroke,
                 int strokeWeight)
        Creates a rectangle object
        Parameters:
        x - x-cord of top left corner
        y - y-cord of top left corner
        width - width of rectangle
        height - height of rectangle
        stroke - sets the stroke color on a gray scale
        strokeWeight - the thickness of the lines

      • scale

        public void scale​(int value)
        Dilates the rectangle an input amount from its top left corner point

      • translate

        public void translate​(int x,
                      int y)
        Relocates the rectangle to input point
        Parameters:
        x - x-cord of new point
        y - y-cord of new point

      • draw

        public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws a new instance of a Rectangle object with the left and right edges of the rectangle at x and x + width. The top and bottom edges are at y and y + height.
        Specified by:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        drawer - the PApplet used to draw the rectangle
